content:
https://crates.io/crates/warg-loader

  • Factored the OCI impl out into a PackageSource trait impl
  • Added a LocalSource that treats a simple local directory structure as a registry
  • Updated config system to support multiple registry types
  • Updated CLI to default wasi: namespace to bytecodealliance.org

I also published the new wasmtime 0.2.0 adapter artifacts, which means this now works:

$ cargo install warg-loader
...
$ warg-loader wasi:preview1-command-adapter
Package: wasi:preview1-command-adapter
Versions:
  0.2.0
$ warg-loader wasi:preview-command-adapter fetch 0.2.0
Fetching release details for wasi:preview1-command-adapter@0.2.0...
Downloading content to "wasi-preview1-command-adapter-0.2.0.wasm"...
